value:
This gown is simply stifling... But I
suppose we all suffer for those we
love, from time to time.

Love is a hex that binds two souls for
as long as they both shall live.$k$pWhether I'm the hexed or the one
doing the hexing... I'm ready.

Ahh, I feel so relaxed right now...
Maybe I'll cast a little curse on you.

A little bit of this... And a little of that...
Hmhmhm... This love potion will...
Huh? Oh, it's you.$k$pTrust me when I say you're better off
forgetting what you saw just now.

Normally I spend my time researching
new curses, but for some reason this
outfit has my thoughts...elsewhere...

Here's a message from
$Nf. Don't
worry—I didn't hide a curse inside.

I feel like the whole world is
celebrating with me. Heehee...

Must be the power of love.
Hmhmhm...

Someone is standing in the way
of my happiness...

Is this a symbol of your love?
Why, thank you...

I'm Tharja—just a typical spring bride!
So, point me in the direction of my
fated one, and I'll handle the rest.

I'm glad you're here,
$Nu. I...need
your advice on something...$k$pI know who I'm fated to be with, of
course. After all, I'm dressed up just
for him.$k$pBut then I came here and met you...
And, well, somehow you've become
just as important to me.$k$pSo how am I supposed to choose
between the two of you? Ugh, this is
all your fault.$k$pSo, now what should I do? I used to
think love was a hex of happiness.$k$pBut now I see it's a curse as dark and
malicious as any other.
さあ…
This is love...
きゃああっ！
だめっ…！
Love is a curse.
Vows are eternal.
Together forever.
Make your pledge.
I was almost happy...
うふふふふ
Maybe if he thinks I'd make a suitable bride... What do you think?
Hmph. Seeing me like this may be shocking, but don't get used to it. It's not for you.
The marriage ritual is a curse that binds you to another human for all eternity.
Dressed up like some happy bride... How can anyone stand wearing this?
You think this outfit suits me? Hmph, we've clearly never met.
If I can't become his bride, I'll become a bridesmaid. Then, with the right curse...
Welcome home, dear! I sacrificed a chicken for dinner!
You love me.
Your proposal?
Be happy.
